kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=apiQA, url=https://api-desafio-qa.onrender.com, headers={'accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Set To Dictionary
kw.doc: Adds the given ``key_value_pairs`` and/or ``items`` to the ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Set To Dictionary
kw.doc: Adds the given ``key_value_pairs`` and/or ``items`` to the ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://api-desafio-qa.onrender.com/login path_url=/login headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'accept': 'application/json', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '45'} body=b'{"username": "admin", "password": "password"}'

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.
